basics.name: Ka'ili Benavente
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am double majoring for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences and a B.A. in Korean For Professionals in the Korean Language Flagship Center at the University of Hawai'i. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

work.company: UH Manoa School of Life Sciences
highlights: Collect and distribute mail for all SoLS faculty
Correspondence between SoLS students and faculty
Assist SoLS staff/faculty with a variety of duties including but not limited to vehicle maintenance, equipment handling and distribution, and organizational tasks between STJ, EDM, and LSB
Maintain, update, and oversee schedules of technicians and clients
Make calls and payments through preferred system
Keep up sanitary needs of salon
Assist teachers in student care and instruction
Help prepare and deliver materials for lessons
Communication between various staff covering different subjects

volunteer.organization: Supporting Wellness In Tech and Computing Hawai'i
volunteer.summary: Participating in the organization and planning of social events and promotion, including weekend volunteer work with girl-scouts and K-12 students to introduce STEM and Robotics. Marketing our events and fundraisers through our social media accounts.

awards.title: Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to Hawai'i-resident incoming freshmen who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with an overall GPA of 3.6 or higher at a Hawai'i public school.
